1.1.name: wordpress/content-slide
1.1.description:
Content Slide is used to create fully customizable jquery Fading image slideshow anywhere within your WordPress site. Custom options include slideshow size, color, style and more. Created using Jquery Coin Slider and the fade effect is created using jquery inner Fade effect.

Pro Version

We are working on pro version of this plugin. If you have any comments or suggestions then let us know. WP Content Slide Pro

DEMO
  • Demo Without Navigation Demo
  • Rotating Banners. Demo 1
  • Demo With Navigation Content Slide Plugin
  • Demo Withou
